nodes.text: Star Wars Day-at-a-Time Calendar 2013 is a calendar for 2013 that has a Star Wars fact on every page. The calendar contains new original information. The calendar was the first source to state that Gial Ackbar served as Wilhuff Tarkin's translator during his time as his slave. It also has a new tenet of the Jedi Code. It was published by Trends International LLC
